00031 **  Define Mirror API constants that vary based on OS
00032 */
00033 #define BT_FOREVER  (~0ul)
00034 #define BT_NO_WAIT  (0ul)
00035 
00036 /*
00037 ** Define the various flags for memory mapping
00038 */
00039 #define BT_MAP_WRITE            BT_WR
00040 #define BT_MAP_READ                 BT_RD
00041 #define BT_MAP_SHARE            (1<<2)
00042 
00043 #define BT_MAP_RW       (BT_MAP_READ | BT_MAP_WRITE)
00044 
00045 /*
00046 ** Constants shared between driver and Mirror API
00047 */
00048 #define BT_MIN_IRQ_Q_SIZE       0x10    /* Interrupt Q sizes */
00049 #define DEFAULT_Q_SIZE          0x400
00050 #define BT_MAX_IRQ_Q_SIZE       0x4000
00051 
00052 #define BT_MIN_DMA_THRESHOLD    0x4     /* DMA threshold */
00053 #define DEFAULT_DMA_THRESHOLD   0x80
00054 
00055 #define BT_MIN_DMA_TIMEOUT      200     /* DMA timeout in mSec */
00056 #define DEFAULT_DMA_TIMEOUT     5000
00057 #define BT_MAX_DMA_TIMEOUT      60000
00058 
00059 #define BT_MIN_RESET_DELAY      10      /* Remote reset delay in mSec */
00060 #define DEFAULT_RESET_TIMER     200 
00061 #define BT_MAX_RESET_DELAY      60000
00062 
00063 #define BT_MIN_TRACE_Q_LEN      50      /* Number of trace queue messages */
00064 #define DEFAULT_TRACE_Q_LEN     200 
00065 #define BT_MAX_TRACE_Q_LEN      500
00066 
00067 #define BT_LEN_TR_MSG           80      /* Number of characters for each trace message */
00068 
00069 #define BT_MIN_DMA_CEILING          0x4     /* DMA threshold */
00070 #define DEFAULT_DMA_POLL_CEILING    4096
00071 
00072 #define DEFAULT_LMEM_SIZE       0x10000     /* Default size of the local memory device */
00073 
00074 #define FILE_DEVICE_BTBRIDGE ((DEVICE_TYPE)32768)

00076 /*
00077 ** Define interrupt handling information
00078 */
00079 typedef enum {
00080    BT_IRQ_OVERFLOW,         /* Overflowed ability to deliver IRQ notifications */
00081    BT_IRQ_ERROR,            /* Error interrupt */
00082    BT_IRQ_PRG,          /* Programmed interrupt PT/PR */
00083    BT_IRQ_IACK,         /* VMEbus interrupt */
00084    BT_MAX_IRQ
00085 } bt_irq_t;

00093 ** Macro to help align pointers

00095 #define BT_ALIGN_PTR(buf_p, align) ((((unsigned long)(buf_p))&((align) - 1))?\
00096                                     ((ptrdiff_t)((align)-(((unsigned long) \
00097                                      (buf_p))&((align)-1)))):((ptrdiff_t)0))
